name: Aliens Need Milk Too
description:
Aliens have landed on earth in search of one thing... milk.

Command your crew of aliens in their effort to abduct cows from earth to get more milk! Collect all of the cows before the military shows up and blows up your ship!

Aliens Need Milk Too was created in 1 week for the Blackthornprod 2021 game jam by Tyler Haddad.

How to Play

  • Left click mouse on a cow to send an alien to collect it
  • Aliens take time to pick up cows (they're heavy)
  • Once an alien collects a cow, it'll come back to the ship on its own
  • Tanks will be sent in from the military periodically and will auto-attack your ship - pay attention to your ship's health!
  • Your ship will auto-attack the tanks. The more aliens you have collecting cows, the less damage your ship will do!
